title: How to write a letter to the headmaster of your school complaining to him about the bad behaviors of your class teacher - Quora

response.answer_text: Yo, dude! My teacher needs a real slap on his hands, you know what I mean? He wants to touch my weiner, and I don’t like my weiner being touched by old sad dudes with moustaches, goaties, and old socks. I think he needs to be punished. Call him up and you will be able to discuss the appropriate punishment for his misconduct while he is touching your weiner. Signature, Date
